content: Consolidate scattered planning YAML files into one master document
Restore milestone YAML files to proper directories (docs/milestones, milestones)
Archive only planning/status YAML files to eliminate confusion
Organize milestone files using file-structure-organizer agent
Create consolidated milestone chronicle using milestone-commit-logger agent
Execute first rolling window optimization experiments (30/7 vs 60/14 vs 90/21 ratios)
Apply statistical validation to window ratio results
Test purging/embargo parameters with optimal window ratios
